channel.title: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client
channel.description: Hey! I have a 508 server and client. When I start my server I get this error: "D:\Programfiler\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin\java.exe" is not a recognizable command. I have the exact same line in my client and it works. I have tried running as admin and changed to javac but it didn't work. What do I need to do?

item.title: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client
item.dc:creator: @Xsef Xsef
item.description:
@Xsef wrote:

It is in my D drive because I installed jdk there. Programfiler is Program Files in Norwegian (I created this folder because I didn’t have one already in my D drive). I have JDK version 1.8.0_25

EDIT: I found out that jdk had an update and I re-installed it and now it works

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client

item.title: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“Xsef, post:4, topic:551134”]@echo off
cd …/bin
Title RuneScape Server
"D:\Programfiler\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin\java.exe" DavidScape/Server 43594
pause

I also have a voule (i think thats a server restarter)

Edit: I am 100% sure that is is the right path.[/quote]

It doesn’t seem like the right path. Why is it in the D:/ drive? And why is it called “programfiler”?

I may be wrong, it just looks wrong to me anyway.

Also what JDK version do you have?

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client

item.title: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client
item.dc:creator: @Xsef Xsef
item.description:
@Xsef wrote:

@echo off
title RuneScape
cd files
title RuneScape Client
java -cp . -Xmx300m client 66 live live software members english game0
@echo Finished
pause

I thought wrong about the client and server being the same code line. It is my client compile which has almost the same lines. But when I start my compile, I get this error: the program cannot start because jli.dll is missing.

Read full topic

cd …/bin
Title RuneScape Server
"D:\Programfiler\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin\java.exe" DavidScape/Server 43594
pause

I also have a voule (i think thats a server restarter)

Edit: I am 100% sure that is is the right path. It’s the same path as my client, and my client works[/quote]

Can you post the one from your client as wekk?

item.title: [508] Java can't run server, but it can run client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551134”]Post your server run.bat code…

What you provided isn’t enough to tell us anything.

Edit: It should also be noted that if you were using an IDE like eclipse, you wouldn’t run into this issue.[/quote]

This.

As well, it should be noted that it seems your path to “java.exe” is not correct. Perhaps verifying this would be another step to take.

Read full topic
